name: Beer in the Times of Pandemia
name_original: Beer in the Times of Pandemia
description:
Beer in the Times of Pandemia is a simple 2D platformer that attempts to simulate the difficulty of buying beer in the times of the Covid-19 pandemia. In face of which your regular journeys to the local super market to stock up on beer turned into potentially dangerous escapades. 

The game features 3 levels, with rising level of difficulty. Collect the beer caps and stomp covids to score points and try to reach the end in the quickest possible time. Your score = points/time 

Controls: LEFT/RIGH + SPACE & P (pause)

note: 

Don't click "QUIT" button, it is not really designed for the in-web play. Just press "Main Menu" and then ESCAPE button to leave the game. 

If the game is not loading in your browser try disabling AD-BLOCKER
